name: WIZZ
description:
Play as a squishy lil' WIZZ in this brutal platformer!

 Thanks to playtesters Beannie, Jack, and Michael!

Follow @retrowillgames on Twitter for updates on my current project The Teleportation Game and future projects!

Controls

Arrow Keys to Traverse

Down to create Resurrection Tower

X to conjure moving platform

Z to shoot magic bolts

M to mute/Unmute

O to decrease volume

P to increase volume

Refresh to restart or play again

This game was made in about 5 days! My first game I've made this fast! Leave a comment with your thoughts and/or score!
